title: Connecting
creator_credit: Bailey Humphries, Emma Reid and Olivia Walker
brief_description: Grandma Swift laments her disconnectedness from the outside world, a quick idea takes a comical journey through modern and old time methods of communication leading to a modern day twist at the end.
